import "./viewProduct.css" import products from "../../constants/data" import BookmarkAddedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/BookmarkAdded'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { userRequest, publicRequest } from "../../requestMethod"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export const ViewProduct = () => { const location = useLocation(); const id = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; const [resturent, setResturent] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getResturents = async () => { const res = await publicRequest.get(`/resturents/find/${id}`); setResturent(res.data); }; getResturents(); }, []) const product = resturent.products; useEffect(() => { }, [product]) function getProduct(type) { return product.filter(item => item.type === type) } // console.log(item1) return (
